title: bislom
author: bislom
content: I am looking for Oxycodon. 5 mg, 10mg or higher doses all Ok.Please PM me if you have or know where I can buy.

comments.author: Beefcake
comments.body: Hi, I think you are in the wrong place. This forum is more for like discussing crypto. Black market transactions are another place. I don't know where that is, sorry, but it isn't here.
